title: Developer needed for space science citizen science website/app maintenance
description: The Aurorasaurus.org project is a successful citizen science project where people can report the Northern and Southern Lights. Our project is looking for part-time developer support to keep the site and apps running in good shape. Additional features could also be added working with the project team based at NASA Goddard.
responsibilities: Maintenance for the site will require a developer with knowledge in the following languages and frameworks: Python (and the various tools needed for web development: pip, virtualenv, etc) Django JavaScript (Backbone, Marionette, Handlebars) JavaScript module loader (ie webpack or browserify) CSS/LESS HTML SQL(Postgres) PostGIS Phonegap Grunt Supervisor Amazon Web Services (S3, EC2, ElasticBeanstalk, RDS, ElasticCache(Redis)) Java (CLAVIN) Git (version control).
